translation.title: Hi, welcome, my name is
translation.sub: I'm a fullstack developer and I'm currently focused on studying
translation.subTwo: but I'm always open to new challenges, as well as getting to know other tools!
translation.Ptext: and it was there that I had my first contact with programming, which sparked my interest and made me really like the area.
translation.textTwo: I had the opportunity to take part in
translation.PtextTwo: the Caldeira Institute's new generation program and furthered my studies in
